column4: Hi, I'm trying to install the server edition of Ubuntu -- I want to just add the desktop component after I've set it up. What's the easiest way to do this (what's the package name for the desktop?)
I know the console. I have a reason for wanting the desktop.
I'm a network admin, I'm switching from Fedora. I just need the name of the desktop component.
Perhaps you can get away with having a lightweight WM and just the tools you need on it to get the job done?
